verses.verse: Let <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arise!<s%> Let his <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered!<s%> Let them who <S%H8130>hate<s%> him also <S%H5127>flee<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

As <S%H6227>smoke<s%> is driven <S%H5086>away,<s%> so drive them <S%H5086>away.<s%> As <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H4549>melts<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> so let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
But let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H8055>glad.<s%> Let them <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H7797>Yes,<s%> let them rejoice with <S%H8057>gladness.<s%>

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H430>God!<s%> Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to his <S%H8034>name!<s%> <S%H5549>Extol<s%> him who <S%H7392>rides<s%> on the <S%H6160>clouds:<s%> to <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> his <S%H8034>name!<s%> <S%H5937>Rejoice<s%> before <S%H6440>him!<s%>
A <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and a <S%H1781>defender<s%> of the <S%H490>widows,<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>sets<s%> the <S%H3173>lonely<s%> in <S%H1004>families.<s%> He brings <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> with <S%H3574>singing,<s%> but the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in a <S%H6707>sun-scorched<s%> land.
<S%H430>God,<s%> when you went <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> when you <S%H6805>marched<s%> through the <S%H3452>wilderness.<s%>.. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembled.<s%> The <S%H8064>sky<s%> also <S%H5197>poured<s%> down rain at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2088>of<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>â€” at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H430>You,<s%> God, <S%H5130>sent<s%> a <S%H5071>plentiful<s%> <S%H1653>rain.<s%> You <S%H3559>confirmed<s%> your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> when it was <S%H3811>weary.<s%>
Your <S%H2416>congregation<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H430>therein.<s%> You, God, <S%H3559>prepared<s%> your <S%H2896>goodness<s%> for the <S%H6041>poor.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>announced<s%> the <S%H562>word.<s%> The ones who <S%H1319>proclaim<s%> it are a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6635>company.<s%>
<S%H4428>"Kings<s%> of <S%H6635>armies<s%> <S%H5074>flee!<s%> They <S%H5074>flee!<s%>" She who <S%H5116>waits<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H2505>divides<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%>

while you <S%H7901>sleep<s%> among the <S%H8240>campfires,<s%> the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H2645>sheathed<s%> with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> her <S%H3671>feathers<s%> with <S%H3422>shining<s%> <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
When the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6566>scattered<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> in <S%H7949>her,<s%> it snowed on <S%H6756>Zalmon.<s%>
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H430>Bashan<s%> are majestic <S%H2022>mountains.<s%> The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> are <S%H1386>rugged.<s%>

Why do you <S%H7520>look<s%> in <S%H1386>envy,<s%> you rugged <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> where <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2530>chooses<s%> to <S%H3427>reign?<s%> <S%H3068>Yes,<s%> Yahweh will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> there <S%H5331>forever.<s%>

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are tens of <S%H7239>thousands<s%> and <S%H7239>thousands<s%> of <S%H8136>thousands.<s%> The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is among <S%H5514>them,<s%> from Sinai, into the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

You have <S%H5927>ascended<s%> on <S%H4791>high.<s%> You have led <S%H7628>away<s%> <S%H7628>captives.<s%> You have <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%> among <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H5637>yes,<s%> among the rebellious <S%H3050>also,<s%> that Yah <S%H430>God<s%> might dwell <S%H7931>there.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> who <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H6006>bears<s%> our <S%H410>burdens,<s%> even the God who is our <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H410>God<s%> is to us a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H4190>deliverance.<s%> To <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> belongs <S%H8444>escape<s%> from <S%H4194>death.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4272>strike<s%> through the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies,<s%> the <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H6936>scalp<s%> of such a one as <S%H1980>still<s%> continues in his <S%H817>guiltiness.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> I will bring you <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%>

That you may crush <S%H4272>them,<s%> dipping your <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H1818>blood,<s%> that the <S%H3956>tongues<s%> of your <S%H3611>dogs<s%> may have their portion from your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>"
They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> your <S%H1979>processions,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> even the <S%H1979>processions<s%> of my <S%H410>God,<s%> my <S%H4428>King,<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
The <S%H7891>singers<s%> went <S%H6923>before,<s%> the <S%H5059>minstrels<s%> followed <S%H310>after,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5959>ladies<s%> playing with <S%H8608>tambourines,<s%>
<S%H1288>"Bless<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4721>congregations,<s%> even the <S%H136>Lord<s%> in the <S%H4726>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>"

There is <S%H6810>little<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> their <S%H7287>ruler,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> their <S%H7277>council,<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
Your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H5797>strength.<s%> <S%H5810>Strengthen,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> that <S%H2098>which<s%> you have done for <S%H6466>us.<s%>
Because of your <S%H1964>temple<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H2986>bring<s%> presents to <S%H7862>you.<s%>

<S%H1605>Rebuke<s%> the wild <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7070>reeds,<s%> the <S%H5712>multitude<s%> of the <S%H47>bulls,<s%> with the <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%> Being <S%H7511>humbled,<s%> may it bring <S%H7518>bars<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> <S%H967>Scatter<s%> the <S%H5971>nations<s%> that <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H7128>war.<s%>
<S%H2831>Princes<s%> shall come <S%H857>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall hurry to stretch <S%H7323>out<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> you <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth!<s%> Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H136>Lord!<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

To him who <S%H7392>rides<s%> on the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> which are of <S%H6924>old;<s%> <S%H5414>behold,<s%> he utters his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> a <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
<S%H5414>Ascribe<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> to <S%H430>God!<s%> His <S%H1346>excellency<s%> is over <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> his <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in the <S%H7834>skies.<s%>

You are <S%H3372>awesome,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> in your <S%H4720>sanctuaries.<s%> The <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H5797>power<s%> to his <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H1288>Praise<s%> be to <S%H430>God!<s%>
